com.pitchedapps.capsule.library.adapters

Class CapsuleAdapter<T,V extends CapsuleViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<V>
      • com.pitchedapps.capsule.library.adapters.CapsuleAdapter<T,V>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SampleAdapter

    public abstract class CapsuleAdapter<T,V extends CapsuleViewHolder>
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<V>
    Created by Allan Wang on 2016-12-21.

    Base adapter with helper methods to add to the list
